sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_kmf_crypto_caller_policy</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sys_kmf_crypto_caller_policy">crypto_module.parent_crypto_module=620aed380b233300af4deaf1a3673a09^type=5^ORtype=3^ORtype=1^EQ<item display_table="sys_kmf_crypto_module" display_value="column_level_encryption" endquery="false" field="crypto_module.parent_crypto_module" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="620aed380b233300af4deaf1a3673a09"/> <item display_value="System Access" endquery="false" field="type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="5"/> <item display_value="Scope" endquery="false" field="type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="true" value="3"/> <item display_value="Script" endquery="false" field="type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="true" value="1"/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Reject Enterprise Types when Enterprise </name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { var isNPEInstalled = new global.PlatformEncryptionUtil().checkIfNPEInstalled(); if(isNPEInstalled === false) { typeToName = ["", "Script", "", "Scope", "", "System Access", "", ""]; gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Creating a {0} Module Access Policy is only allowed when CLE Enterprise plugin is installed", typeToName[current.type])); current.setAbortAction(true); } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-12-22 00:02:53</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>19e13064c3112010af4da585b140ddb2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Reject Enterprise Types when Enterprise disabled</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="ServiceNow Key Management Framework" source="sn_kmf">c515f25b53332300cd1eddeeff7b126e</sys_package> <sys_policy>protected</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow Key Management Framework">c515f25b53332300cd1eddeeff7b126e</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_19e13064c3112010af4da585b140ddb2</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-06-09 18:31:37</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=19e13064c3112010af4da585b140ddb2"/> </record_update>
